content: योजनं [युज्-भावादौ ल्युट्] {@--1@} Joining, uniting, yoking. {@--2@} Applying, fixing. {@--3@} Preparation, arrangement. {@--4@} Grammatical construction, construing the sense of a passage. {@--5@} A measure of distance equal to four {%Krośas%} or eight or nine miles; न योजनशतं दूंरं वाह्यमानस्य तृष्णया <ls>H. 1. 146.</ls> {@--6@} Exciting, instigation. {@--7@} Concentration of the mind, abstraction (= योग <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--8@} Erecting, constructing (also योजना in this sense). {@--9@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Effort, exertion. {@--10@} A road, way. --ना {@--1@} Junction, union, connection. {@--2@} Grammatical construction.
